Text.text: Welcome, you who are learned in the ways of mushrooms, to my fantastical fungi farm. You must be wondering why I've brought you here today. Well, the answer is quite simple...
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: I, the great wizard Agaricus, have discovered the secret to infinite magical power!! That's right. With an abundance of fungal spores, even the weakest magical practitioner can crank their output up to 11!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: But there's one problem. I can't seem to make these mushrooms grow as quickly as I need them to. Simply put - I need spores. Thousands of spores. No, millions!! I need nine billion spores, and I need them right now!!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: With your help, I can surely become the greatest wizard the world has ever known. The Sultan of Spores. The Mikado of Mycobiota. The Czar of Calcarisporiellaceae...
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: And if you fail? Why, I'll just turn you into a toadstool. It's a foolproof plan.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Now, my fungal chum, let me explain how the mushroom magic works!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Before you lies a boggy paradise, ripe for the planting. But what to plant? Well, that depends on what's inside my spectacular sack o'spores!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: You'll receive six starter mushrooms with which to begin planting. Drag them into the field to place them - but beware of obstacles which prevent proper planting!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: You can right-click to deselect a mushroom. You can observe the area of effect before committing to a placement -  using "R" to rotate your mushroom. You don't have to plant them all - prudent polypore placement is vital!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Once you've decided where each mushroom should be planted, press the "start chain phase" button and select the mushroom you wish to start the chain from. This is where the magic happens!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: The mushrooms will generate spores. Hundreds of spores. THOUSANDS of spores. Watch your spore score roll in, and remember!! More spores equals more magic!!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Should your spore total not quite hit the spot, hit the "next turn" button to try again. And choose more wisely this time. There are consequences to failure, you know...
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Now go, my learned friend! Grow like your life depends on it! Because it does!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS
